additional_channels.desc: A comma separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group can custom add usergroup members too.

channels.desc: A comma separated string of encoded channel IDs for which the User Group uses as a default.

description.desc: A short description of the User Group.

enable_section.desc: Configure this user group to show as a sidebar section for all group members. Note: Only relevant if group has 1 or more default channels added.

handle.desc: A mention handle. Must be unique among channels, users and User Groups.

include_count.desc: Include the number of users in each User Group.

name.desc: A name for the User Group. Must be unique among User Groups.

team_id.desc: Encoded team id where the user group has to be created, required if org token is used.

errors.description_too_long: Given usergroup description is too long
errors.handle_already_exists: Handle is already in use on this workspace
errors.invalid_channel_provided: An invalid channel ID was provided
errors.invalid_group_provided: An invalid group ID was provided
errors.name_already_exists: Name is already in use on this workspace
errors.paid_teams_only: Usergroups can only be used on paid Slack teams
errors.permission_denied: The user does not have permission to create a User Group.
errors.plan_upgrade_required: This workspace does not have access to User Groups, as that feature is only available on Standard and above plans.
errors.target_team_not_on_org: Target team specified is not on the org in context
errors.target_team_must_be_specified_in_org_con: No target team was specified but the team in context is an org
